title: Verizon and Frontier just merged – here's what you're getting out of it
full_text: Verizon and Frontier just merged – here's what you're getting out of it. The merger brings four lines for $20 each, free iPhone 17 offers, and six months of free fiber internet.. Verizon says a better deal is waiting for everyone right now. | Image credit Verizon Businesses arent left out either. Existing Verizon Business mobile customers can score six months of Frontier Bus… [+1808 chars]
